venue.name: Beginning of Shining Sea Bike Path

item.description:
Looking to sign up some people to join my friend Bob and I on this beautiful ride on the Cape.

We will meet at the beginning of the trail -County Rd. In Falmouth....

http://www.falmouthmass.us/deppage.php?number=38

Path is 21 miles round trip - there are some beautiful views of the coast!

Please be sure that you are capable of riding 21 miles in length and have a road/hybrid in good condition.

Suggested items to bring:

1) Spare tube

2) Sunscreen

3) Snack Food

4) 2 Water Bottles

5) Bathing Suit for possible dip!

6) Sense of humor

7) Helmets Mandatory

 

We will likely grab some lunch/ice cream after the ride in Falmouth/Woods Hole area.
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the event is 617-894-8454
item.name: Shining Sea Bike Path - Falmouth, MA
